name: Mind Hackers (Jam Version)
description:
Mind Hackers

My https://itch.io/jam/bullet-hell-jam-2022 entry! Was a bit of a late entry but here we are! 

PLOT:
You are a "Mind Hacker" for hire called Vans!
You are recruited to cure some of the most difficult mental health disabilities with a new technology called "Esper". With this new tech you are able to warp into a person is mind and destroy the root problem of the patient. 

But of course, if anyone could do it, "Mind hacker's would not be needed." 
It's a dangerous job. "Mind Hacker's" could end up trapped in the mind of the patient forever.
Your patient is called Thena. She has been suffering of extreme neorotic episodes. This has completely messed with her life and her aspirations. This is why her family hired you to do the imposible. Enter her mind and cleanse it. 

Updates will be coming soon expanding the lore and gameplay mechanics! 

Gameplay!

-You have 20HP

-Everything in the screen can kill you and will kill you

-Avoid at all costs see if you can reach the boss! 

-Let me know your high score! 

Controls: 

-AWSD for movement

-P for pausing (good for strategic decisions and taking a break)
